name: Midnight Shift
description:
Midnight Shift is a first-person sim were the player takes the role of a gas station attendant working the midnight shift. The player will need to perform standard tasks and attend the to the costumers needs. Everything will seem fine until you start receiving harassment calls and a stranger starts stocking you.



SYNOPSIS:
Although you are having car problems; you make it to work on time. Your midnight shift starts like any other night. You clock in and take care of your routine tasks all while attending customers. Everything seems fine, until a particular set of events start to unravel, and you are faced with what can only be described as a nightmare.

FEATURES:
First-Person View
Keyboard & Mouse Controls
Multiple Camera Filters
Interactive Objects
Creepy environment
Hair-raising chase



FOR BEST EXPERIENCE:
Use headphones
Play in the dark
